description:
Moteuchi Youta, is a 1st year high school boy and the male protagonist. Ridiculed "Motenai Youta" (an intentional misreading of his surname and wordplay with 持てない, i. e. "Unpopular Youta") at school, Youta is indeed very shy and not popular with girls but a talented illustrator and a nice guy. His mother died when he was young, his father being a designer is often away from home, so Youta practically lives alone.
At the beginning of this story the boy is suffering from a heartbreak: His secret crush http://anidb.net/ch16493 [Hayakawa Moemi] (who considers them just friends) told him that she`s fallen for Youta`s buddy http://anidb.net/ch16492 [Niimai Takashi] (the school`s heartthrob) who rejected her in an instant, and now she needs Youta`s help to conquer Takashi`s heart.
So in order to clear out the cobwebs Youta rented a video featuring the http://anidb.net/ch15911 [Video Girl Ai], "a girl to cheer you up".
name: Moteuchi Youta
